html:
Workato Joins AWS Partner Network and is a Launch Partner for AI for Data Analytics

Mutual customers can harness the power of Amazon SageMaker with Workato’s purpose-built Connector and Accelerator to democratize data science across their organization

Workato, a leading global enterprise automation platform, today announced it is joining the AWS Partner Network (APN). Workato is also excited to announce its participation in Amazon Web Services, Inc. (AWS) AI for Data Analytics (AIDA), a set of AWS Partner solutions which embed predictive analytics into mainstream analytics workspaces. AWS AIDA Partners solutions enable domain experts without technical backgrounds to harness artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML). As part of the launch, Workato has released an AI/ML Connector, which allows for seamless integrations from any data source into Amazon SageMaker, and AI/ML Accelerator, which provides packaged Recipes and reference architectures to address key AI/ML use cases like customer churn.

Workato empowers business and information technology (IT) teams to harness the power of enterprise automation across their application stack. The company is working closely with leading global partners, including Cognizant and PK Global, to deliver AI and ML value to joint customers on the Workato platform. It is built on a foundation of integration, and offers thousands of pre-built connectors with leading cloud and on-premises technologies. This approach enables companies to power automations from insights, including from AutoML jobs in Amazon SageMaker. Working together, Workato and AWS can empower enterprises to aggregate, leverage, and act on the massive stream of big data created across their business.

“We are very excited to join APN and enhance the value our joint customers already enjoy,” said Markus Zirn, SVP of Strategy & Business Development at Workato. ”It’s an absolute privilege to be a launch partner for AWS AIDA. We see organizations across the enterprise bringing the power of AI and ML to their business analysts and know the impact AWS AIDA enables will be massive.”

Changing customer demands and growing pressure on business leaders to do more with their company data has made it necessary for investments in AI and ML technologies. However, these technologies, along with the necessary steps to connect these technologies into companies’ existing tools have traditionally required the skills of expert developers.

The business benefits created when customers leverage Workato include:

  • Lower operational costs: harnessing AI/ML and automating actions directly from insights no longer requires a data science background.
  • Improved customer experience: low-code / no-code tools enable customers to accomplish more, faster.
  • Driving growth: Business teams are empowered to leverage actionable insights identified in their data to power cross-functional impact and growth.

About Workato

Workato is a leading enterprise automation platform. Recognized as a leader, Workato is the only enterprise platform that enables both business and IT to integrate their apps, automate business workflows, and drive real time outcomes from business events, without compromising security and governance. Workato is trusted by over 7,000 of the world's top brands and fastest growing innovators. For more information, visit www.workato.com or connect with us on social media:

  • Blog: https://www.workato.com/blog
  • Business Systems Community: https://systematic.workato.com/
  • Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/workato
  • LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/workato
